chapter.text: Alo. Wigi d issekniyen n Tezmamt, u d Leqwoan ipbegginen
Ahat wid ijehlen ssaramen ad ilin d imvuaen
Eoo iten ad ccen, ad zhun, a ten issedhu usirem. Deqqal ad eoen
Ur Nesquccu tamdint, siwa ma d ayen i s iuran, ipwassnen
Ur illi lois ara d isqeoben, ne$ ara iswexxoen lajel is
Nnan: "a win u$uo d irs usmekti! Kecc, war ccekk, d aoehbani
Acimi ur a$ d tusiv ara, s lmalayek, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Ur Nesrusu lmalayek, siwa s tidep. Imiren, ur pganin
Ih, Nekwni Nessers ed asmekti. Ih, Nekwni a Neareb fellas
Ni$ Nuzen ed, uqbel ik, i ikabaren imezwura
Ur ten id ippas umazan, mebla ma ttahan fellas
Akka ay t Nessekcam deg ulawen ibe$wviyen
Ur uminen yis, ulamma ooan d imezwura tannumi
Xas ad asen Nelli tabburt igenni, ad ppalin $uoes
a d inin, war ccekk: "ittules ieoi nne$, ne$ nekwni d agdud iwumi sseeren
Ni$ Nerra itran deg igenni. Ncebbee iten i wid ipmuqulen
Nesdari ten, si yal cciian imenfi
Kkes ed win d issemeessen s tufra, A p iddu, fellas, ujajie n uuee
Tamurt Nessewsaa p; Nerra fellas idurar; Nessem$i d, degs, yal cci, s lmizan
Nerra, degs, lqut i kunwi, akw i wid ur tecceccayem ara
Lexzayen n yal cci, $uoneÂ£ kan. Siwa s lkil ipwassnen i ten id Nesrusu
Nuzen ed avu isswayen. Nesse$li d aman seg igenni, yissen Nessew ikwen. Ur llin ara lexzayen is $uowen
Ih, d Nekwni i Issidiren, i Ineqqen. D Nekwni ay d Iweooaten
Ni$ Nessen imezwura nnwen, Nessen ineggura
Ih, Mass ik, Neppa, a ten id Ifser. Ih, Neppa, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ni$ Nexleq amdan si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Nexleq loenn, iu$ leal, si tmes n ccili
Mi Inna Mass ik, i lmalayek: "Nek Xelqe$ amdan, si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Mi t Mesle$, u Uuuve$ as si ooue iW, ersemt $uoes, knumt
Knant akw lmalayek, akken ma llant
siwa Iblis, iugi ad yili ar wid iknan
Inna: "a yIblis, acu ik iu$en, ur telliv ar wid iknan
Inna: "ur kennu$ i umdan, i Txelqev si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Inna: "effe$ segs! Aql ak, ihi, d imenfi
Ih, fellak ddell alamma d ass uqeiii
Inna: "a Mass iw! Eoo iyi alamma d ass n tnekra nnsen
Inna: "ih, kecc seg wid ipganin
ar ass n yiumir ipwassnen
Inna: "a Mass iw! Imi yi Terriv d a$ewway, war ccekk, ad asen cebbee$ ddunit, a ten $ewwu$, akken ma llan
Kkes ed imdanen iK izedganen garasen
Inna: "$uoI, wagi d abrid uwqim
War ccekk, ur tesaiv adabu $ef imdanen iW, siwa wid i k ivefoen seg imjaeen
Loahennama, s tidep, d ppaaud nnsen akw
D m ua tebbura; ar yal tabburt, s urbaa ines
Ih, wid ipeezziben, di leonanat akked tliwa
kecmet pen di tifrat, akked laman
Nekkes i illan d dd$el, deg idmaren nnsen. D atmaten, deg imieoeen, mqabalen
Ur aaggun degsen, ur ten id ssuffu$en segsen
Xebbeo ixdimen iW; Nek, s tidep, Psemmiee$, Peunu
U aaaqeb iW d aaaqeb aqeoean
Xebbeo iten $ef inebgawen n Iboahim
Mi kecmen $uoes, nnan: "tifrat"! Inna: "s tidep, nugad ikwen
Nnan: "ur ppagwad, a k nbecceo kan, s uqcic amusnaw
Inna: "tbecceom iyi d, mi wessre$. Acu iyi d tbeccoem
Nnan: "Nbecceo ik id, s tidep, ur ppili seg wid iuysen
Inna: "anwa iuysen aeunu n Mass is, siwa im$eooqen
Inna: "d acu ay d lmeqsud nnwen, a yimceggaen
Nnan: "Nekwni, s tidep, neppuceggaa d s agdud ibe$wviyen
Kkes ed tawacult n Lui, ara nsellek akw
siwa tameiiut is. Ih, Nseyya a ppili, neppat, seg ineggura
Mi oueen imceggaen ar twacult n Lui
inna: "kunwi, s tidep, d imdanen ur nessin
Nnan: "xaii, Nusa d, $uoek, s wayen rran di ccekk
Nusa d, $uoek, s tidep. Nekwni, war ccekk, nessawal tidep
Oue akked twacult ik, mi mazal yiv. Ddu deffir sen. Ur d itezzi yiwen degwen! Aaddit anda i wen ippunefk lameo
Nseyya yas lameo agi: a d gwrin ad pwagezmen wakali
Usan d, imezda$ n temdint, feoeen
Inna: "wigi, s tidep, d inebgawen iw, ur iyi cmmatet
Eezbet i Oebbi, ur iyi sdullut
Nnan: "day ur ak negdil ara imdanen
Inna: "atent an issi, ma taanam
S tudert ik, ar ddebdeben si ssekoan nnsen
Iwwet iten usu$u, tafrara
Nesrewt ip. Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur n yieoa n talaxt
Deg waya, s tidep, d issekniyen i wid issnen ad ssikden
Apan, ih, deg ubrid n yal ass
Deg waya, s tidep, d assekni i lmumnin
Ih, llan At Teegi, war ccekk, d imednas
Nerra d ppao segsen. Ihi, atent an, snat nni, deg ubrid ibanen
Ni$ At Leioo skaddben imazanen
Nebbwi yasen d issekniyen nneÂ£. Wexxoen asen
Llan qqazen ixxamen n laman, deg idurar
Iwwet iten usu$u, tauebeit
Ulay sen ixdem wayen la keppben
Ur Nexliq tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, siwa s tidep. Imir a d ias, war ccekk. Ihi, ssuref s lekyasa
Ih, Mass ik d Axellaq, d Amusnaw
Ni$ Nefka yak d ua i usniles, akked Leqwoan ameqwoaean
Ur pmuqul ar wayen is N$at kra n twaculin nnsen. Ur $webbel ilmend nnsen. Zger tacvai ik $ef lmumnin
Ini: "nekkini, s tidep, d aneddao ipbegginen
Akken id Nessers i wid ibvan
i irran Leqwoan d iericen
S Mass ik, ard a ten Nesteqsi akw
ef wayen xeddmen
Ihi, emdee ayen i$ef i k ippunefk lameo, iixxeo i imcurak
Ih, a k Nqennaa mgal wid ittihin
i irran oebbi nniven, ar tama n Oebbi. Deqqal ad eoen
Ni$ Neeoa ar ul ik, kecc, iaaueo seg wayen qqaoen
Sbuccaa Mass ik s ccekoan. Ili seg wid ikennun
Aabed Mass ik, ar k id ias utebbet
